name: My Little Pair o’ Dice
description:
** BAR FIGHT CONTROLS **

Move: WASD

Shoot: Hold Left Mouse Button

Interact: F

** GAMBLE CONTROLS **

Throw Dice: Spacebar

Lock Score: Click on Category

Lock Dice: Click on Die

** GENERAL CONTROLS **

Mute Music: M

Pause Game: Escape

** SYNOPSIS **

It's 9 PM...

You've been gambling all day

Winning streak after winning streak...

you can't stop winning.

Everyone is getting annoyed with you but you don't care.

After a final roll with your Pair o' dice, the people snap,

and launch into a drunken murderous fury

But you haven't had enough...

Just...

one...

more...

GAME !!
